    • Method Detail

      • getSequence

        public static java.lang.String getSequence(java.lang.String polyString)
        getSequence()
        Parameters:
        polyString - an input String, taken from user input, to be evaluated
        Returns:
        a String output of the evaluation. If the user used an = sign, this will be repeated (e.g input: a = 3 +4, output: a =7); otherwise just the result of the evaluation is outputted a a string.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Takes in the user input by typing it in, evaluates it and prints the result out to them. User will choose interactive mode (called usermode) or file mode and then proceed only in that mode for the rest of the method running.
        Parameters:
        args - user typing in whatever they please.
